::: Hell Beast recived the message and began to think it over. He looked at 
his troops who were getting restless, and his mission was to come here and 
get Energon, with Shuko's help they could easily get enough. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Predacons, we are now in an Allience with the Newcomers. 
We are Predacons, and we Predacons will triumph! Now we will seige the Ark 
and finish off the Maximals.

::: Inferno began appluading, as for the others they grunted and were happy 
to get some action. :::

::: Hell Beast sent the transmission excepting the proposal. :::
